name: The Samnites
declaringWar: Your wickedness towards our Oscan brethren ends today! Samnite Federation, m-m-m-m-morph up!
attacked: The Three Great Winds blow in my favor little man. You will not be walking away from this one.
defeated: Oh, gods forgive me. All is lost...
introduction: If you call me a Sabine I will shit in your villa.
neutralHello: The federation greets you, foreign emissary.
hateYes: This offer is too good to reject.
afterPeace: This war has cost us all too much. The next decade will be one of friendship.
uniques: Provides a [Pagi Kombennio] in your first [5] cities for free
May buy [Settler] units with [Faith] [in all cities]
